data.title: Lunch time-- fist visit
data.text: Located in the Bank Tower (Big Pink as we locals refer to it) Served are made from scratch soups and sandwiches. Tried it for the first time today and I was pleasantly surprised. Good place to have lunch on a rainy, Portland work week. 👍

data.title: Soup and Sandwich for lunch...without leaving the building
data.text: The U.S. Bancorp Tower in downtown Portland has a number of places to catch a bite to eat during lunch hours.  In this instance, you can get soup and sandwiches...  On the whole, it's just that...soup and sandwiches.  There are a few seats in the restaurant, but the place is fairly Spartan.  My sandwich was pretty average, with a pile of turkey in the middle that overwhelmed any other content.  The selection is good, though, and perhaps there are better choices, but I was sufficiently underwhelmed that I will probably not return, given all the other options for eating places in downtown Portland.  The employees were friendly, the prices were pretty typical for the site, and it made it possible to stay inside rather than venture out into the weather if you hou happened to be in that building on business.
